const response = await client.search({
  index: "museums",
  size: 0,
  aggregations: {
    "zoomed-in": {
      filter: {
        geo_bounding_box: {
          location: {
            top_left: "POINT (4.9 52.4)",
            bottom_right: "POINT (5.0 52.3)",
          },
        },
      },
      aggregations: {
        zoom1: {
          geohex_grid: {
            field: "location",
            precision: 12,
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
